alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mississippi, west central Pemiscot and southeastern Dunklin Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manila, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gosnell, Manila, Leachville, Senath, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Dell, Little River, Victoria, Jolliff Store, Calumet, Dearman, Lennie, Big Lake, Hightower, Buckeye, Mandalay, Woodland Corner, Pawheen and Lowden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
